video.title: Grace and Frankie
video.synopsis: Jane Fonda and Lily Tomlin co-star as two women forced to reinvent their lives in this funny, honest, Emmy-nominated Netflix Original series.

episodes.synopsis: Grace and Frankie are stunned when their husbands inform them that they want divorces. They're even more stunned when they find out why.
episodes.title: The End

episodes.synopsis: The messy realities of divorce start to sink in for Grace, Frankie, Robert, Sol and their equally frazzled adult children.
episodes.title: The Credit Cards

episodes.synopsis: Grace and Frankie decide to go back to work. Robert and Sol have an awkward dinner party for their children.
episodes.title: The Dinner

episodes.synopsis: Emotions run high when a funeral throws Grace, Frankie, Robert and Sol together in public for the first time since the split.
episodes.title: The Funeral

episodes.synopsis: Grace has an eye-opening experience when she goes out for frozen yogurt with Frankie and Brianna on a Saturday night.
episodes.title: The Fall

episodes.synopsis: Sol takes care of Frankie after she has an earthquake freak-out, while Grace goes on her first date. Coyote pays Mallory a surprise visit.
episodes.title: The Earthquake

episodes.synopsis: Frankie, Grace and Brianna have unexpected encounters when they try new ways to deal with being single.
episodes.title: The Spelling Bee

episodes.synopsis: Frankie takes a new look at her Yam Man Jacob, while Grace and Guy get closer. Bud and Coyote have a brotherly talk. Sol is terrified of Brianna.
episodes.title: The Sex

episodes.synopsis: Brianna tries Frankie's homemade organic beauty product. Robert finds out about Guy and Grace. Frankie tries to set boundaries with Sol.
episodes.title: The Invitation

episodes.synopsis: After they sign the divorce papers, Frankie, Grace, Sol, Robert and Bud remember a pivotal weekend from five years before.
episodes.title: The Elevator

episodes.synopsis: Grace tells Frankie a secret that Frankie shares with Sol, setting off multiple arguments in both houses. Brianna gets closer with a co-worker.
episodes.title: The Secrets

episodes.synopsis: Bud and Coyote ask Brianna and Mallory to help them throw Sol and Robert's bachelor party. Grace offers to do ANYTHING to cheer up Frankie.
episodes.title: The Bachelor Party

episodes.synopsis: As the wedding day approaches, Grace and Robert have problems expressing themselves, while Sol and Frankie finally clear out their old house.
episodes.title: The Vows
